hero.title: Cookie Policy
hero.description: Learn about how we use cookies to improve your experience.

sections.title: What Are Cookies?
sections.content: Cookies are small text files that are placed on your device when you visit our website. They help us provide you with a better experience by remembering your preferences, analyzing site usage, and assisting with our marketing efforts.

subsections.title: Essential Cookies
subsections.description: These cookies are necessary for the website to function properly. They enable core functionality such as security, network management, and accessibility.

subsections.title: Analytics Cookies
subsections.description: We use analytics cookies to understand how visitors interact with our website, helping us improve our services and user experience.

subsections.title: Marketing Cookies
subsections.description: These cookies track your online activity to help advertisers deliver more relevant advertising or to limit how many times you see an ad.

sections.title: How We Use Cookies
items: To remember your preferences and settings
To understand how you use our website
To improve our services and user experience
To provide personalized content and advertising
To ensure the security of your account

sections.title: Managing Cookies
sections.content: You can control and manage cookies in various ways:
items: Browser settings to block or delete cookies
Cookie consent preferences on our website
sections.note: Please note that blocking some types of cookies may impact your experience on our website.

sections.title: Third-Party Cookies
sections.content: Some cookies are placed by third-party services that appear on our pages. We use these services to:
items: Analyze site traffic and user behavior
